spec_data.Name: SDL_Pango
spec_data.Description:
Pango is the text rendering engine of GNOME 2. SDL_Pango connects that engine
to SDL, the Simple DirectMedia Layer.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 12:08:16 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Rendering of internationalized text for SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer)
